snippet.title: Glow Hockey 2 for Android
snippet.description:
Glow Hockey 2 updates the charm of the table hockey game with bright neon graphics and realistic physics for your Android phone. Using your finger to control your paddle, take control of the puck to beat your opponent. 
The gameplay is smooth and responsive, and although simple to play, it's challenging to master. There are 4 difficulty levels in the single player mode, or your can go head to head with a friend on the same device, using your phone as a miniature table. You can alter your paddles and pucks and there are a whole 10 different themes to change the look of the table. Turn on the  vibrate option to give impact for when somebody scores. Best out of 10 wins!
